info.name: nginx version detect
author: philippedelteil
info.description: Some nginx servers have the version on the response header. Useful when you need to find specific CVEs on your targets.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: forum.inclusion.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store Content-Security-Policy: upgrade-insecure-requests; base-uri 'self'; object-src 'none'; script-src https://forum.inclusion.beta.gouv.fr/logs/ https://forum.inclusion.beta.gouv.fr/sidekiq/ https://forum.inclusion.beta.gouv.fr/mini-profiler-resources/ https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard20/assets/ https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard20/brotli_asset/ https://forum.inclusion.beta.gouv.fr/extra-locales/ https://dub2.discourse-cdn.com/standard20/highlight-js/ https://dub2.discourse-cdn.com/standard20/javascripts/ https://dub2.discourse-cdn.com/standard20/plugins/ https://dub2.discourse-cdn.com/standard20/theme-javascripts/ https://dub2.discourse-cdn.com/standard20/svg-sprite/ https://stats.data.gouv.fr/matomo.js https://stats.data.gouv.fr/piwik.php https://stats.data.gouv.fr/ http://forum.inclusion.beta.gouv.fr/matomo.js http://forum.inclusion.beta.gouv.fr/hotjar.js https://static.hotjar.com/ https://script.hotjar.com/; worker-src 'self' https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard20/assets/ https://aws1.discourse-cdn.com/standard20/brotli_asset/ https://dub2.discourse-cdn.com/standard20/javascripts/ https://dub2.discourse-cdn.com/standard20/plugins/; manifest-src 'self' Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Date: Sun, 17 Apr 2022 04:31:41 GMT Discourse-Proxy-Id: app-router-tiehunter02.dub2 Referrer-Policy: strict-origin-when-cross-origin Server: nginx Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 Vary: Accept-Encoding Vary: Accept X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Discourse-Cached: store X-Discourse-Route: categories/index X-Discourse-Trackview: 1 X-Download-Options: noopen X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none X-Request-Id: 2bf0e9c8-571c-4a19-bd97-66c2102fbc47 X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Communauté de l'inclusion - Le forum de l'inclusion est ouvert à tous les acteurs de l'inclusion. Partagez vos pratiques, posez vos questions au sujet de la Plateforme de l'Inclusion, ou échangez avec d'autres acteurs : Pôle emploi, Mission Locale, Cap Emploi, associations, bénévoles, CIP, entreprises [...]

Communauté de l'inclusion
Catégorie Sujets

Actualités & Informations

Découvrez toute l’actualité des acteurs de l’inclusion (Evolutions des services de la plateforme, nouveautés, astuces…)
79

Service Public de l'Insertion et de l'Emploi

SPIE = Service Public de l’Insertion et de l’Emploi.
11

Le marché de l'inclusion & vous

Mise en visibilité des offres commerciales des Entreprises Sociales Inclusives (ou Employeurs Solidaires)
3

Le pilotage de l'inclusion & vous

Proposer des tableaux de bord prêts à l’emploi pour permettre aux acteurs de l’inclusion de prendre des décisions mieux éclairées, tout en réduisant le temps de collecte de données et de production d’indicateurs
5

Les emplois de l'inclusion

87
  • Accueil
  • Catégories
  • Charte
  • Conditions générales d'utilisation
  • Politique de confidentialité

Optimisé par Discourse, le rendu est meilleur quand JavaScript est activé.

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 45207
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;forum.inclusion.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 45207
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 3, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;forum.inclusion.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
forum.inclusion.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	CNAME	communauteinclusion.hosted-by-discourse.com.
communauteinclusion.hosted-by-discourse.com.	900	IN	MX	10 mx-corp1.discoursemail.com.
communauteinclusion.hosted-by-discourse.com.	900	IN	MX	20 mx-corp.discoursemail.com.

info.name: HTTP Missing Security Headers
author: socketz
geeknik
g4l1t0
convisoappsec
kurohost
dawid-czarnecki
info.description: It searches for missing security headers, but obviously, could be so less generic and could be useless for Bug Bounty.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: forum.inclusion.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 429 Too Many Requests Connection: close Content-Length: 429 Cache-Control: no-cache Content-Type: text/html Retry-After: 10

429 Too Many Requests

Your IP address has made too many requests to this service over a short amount of time. Please wait a few minutes and try again.

If you are behind a proxy or coming from a large company, you and many other users may appear to be the same person. Please let us know of recurring problems by email: team@discourse.org

author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.
